subject: Through the Eyes of An Exorcist
author: ghuny1
full_text:
Join us for some educating and serious discussion on Demonology and
Conversations with Bishop James Long Through the Eyes of An Exorcist.
Learn what can potentially happen when dealing and communicating with
the Dead, Black Magic and Curses and more.

http://www.archive.org/details/InterviewWithBishopJamesLong
